Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the corner of Hillcrest Drive and Wakeforest Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Both Wakeforest Drive and Hillcrest Drive end here. (or begin, depending on your perspective.) Wakeforest Drive heads north through the eastern area of town, which is mostly administrative, and Hillcrest Drive runs west through the more rural farming lands in south central Oceancrest.
